required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparison of Joint Awareness Between Fixed-bearing and Mobile-bearing Total Knee Arthroplasty Using Titanium-nitride Coated Posterior-stabilized Prostheses
clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of Joint Awareness Between Fixed-bearing and Mobile-bearing Total Knee Arthroplasty Using Titanium-nitride Coated Posterior-stabilized Prostheses

brief_summary.textblock: Comparison of postoperative patient's joint awareness as well as clinical and radiological outcomes between fixed- and mobile-bearing total knee arthroplasty of which the prosthesis is coated with Titanium-nitride.

detailed_description.textblock: Despite numerous comparison studies between mobile- and fixed-bearing TKA as well as several comparison studies regarding clinical and radiological outcomes using titanium-nitride(TiN) prosthesis, there has been no study on postoperative joint awareness despite mobile- and fixed-bearing TKA using TiN prosthesis.

primary_outcome.description: Questionnaire of evaluating how much the patients are aware of their operate joint during daily activities. The higher, the worse. Range: 0-100
Any grating, crackling or popping sensation around knee when moving a joint

secondary_outcome.description: Questionnaire of evaluating how much the patients are aware of their operate joint during daily activities. The higher, the worse. Range: 0-100
Any grating, crackling or popping sensation around knee when moving a joint

other_outcome.measure: Change from baseline Knee Society Score (KSS) at 3 and 5 years
other_outcome.description: Patient-reported Outcome measure; The lower, the worse. Range: 0-200

other_outcome.measure: Change from baseline Western Ontario and McMaster Universities Osteoarthritis Index (WOMAC) at 3 and 5 years
other_outcome.description: Patient-reported Outcome measure; The higher, the worse. Range: 0-96
Questionnaire of evaluating how much the patients are sensitized on the pain. The higher, the worse. Range: 0-100
Questionnaire of evaluating how much the patients are sensitized on the pain. The higher, the worse. Range: 0-100

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Diagnosed with knee joint advanced osteoarthritis
- Age over 55 years old
- Scheduled to undergo primary total knee arthroplasty
Exclusion Criteria:
- Post-traumatic or inflammatory osteoarthritis
- Those who undertook previous ligamentous surgery
- Those who do not understand and give answers to a survey

facility.name: The Catholic University of Korea Seoul St Mary's hospital
